SELECT CONTR_ID, CONTR_NM, FORMAT(CONTR_AMOUNT,',') AS CONTR_AMOUNT, PAYMENT_TERM, CONCAT(SUBSTRING(SPECIAL_NOTE, 1, 50),'...') AS SPECIAL_NOTE, DATE_FORMAT(CONTR_ST_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') As CONTR_ST_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(CONTR_END_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') As CONTR_END_DATE, REGIST_USER_NAME, REGIST_DATE, DEL_YN, CONTR_FILE_ID, ESTIMATE_ID FROM CONTR WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
AND CONTR_NM LIKE '%' #{contrNm} '%'
AND CONTR_ST_DATE >= #{contrStDate} AND CONTR_END_DATE <= #{contrEndDate}
ORDER BY REGIST_DATE DESC
